titleInfo.title: Part of the Cast of Arabia in the Gulf of Persia Surveyed by Lieut.ts J.M. Guy and G.B. Brucks assisted by Lieut.t R. Cogan H.C. Marine. 1822. ‘Engraved by John Bateman. Sheet 2nd'

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:690 x 628 mm, on sheet 860 x 674 mm

mods.abstract: Imprint:Published by James Horsburgh, Hydrographer to the East India Company.Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures. Depth shown by soundings.Nautical chart of the western shores of the Persian Gulf showing the coast between Zaboot [Jazīrat Shuwayhāt] and Abothubbee [Abu Dhabi] compiled from the surveys carried out by the Bombay Marine’s officers between 1820 and 1829.Contains annotations on hazardous features with shoals and rocks represented by crosses. Islands southwest of Abu Dhabi labelled ‘East India Company’s Islands’.
